Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate any information.
Understate: The claim does not appear to understate any information.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by prematurely declaring Atal Bihari Vajpayee dead before any official announcement was made.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on premature declarations made by media outlets without official confirmation.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the media outlets declaring Vajpayee dead were attempting to break news without verifying the information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim suggests that the premature declarations of Vajpayee's death may have been due to a rush to report news or misinterpretation of statements made by Rajnath Singh.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Vajpayee was admitted at AIIMS, Delhi and passed away at 5:05 PM on August 16, 2018, after his condition worsened.
